semantic_identifier: [GOLD-108]: Ingest + persist closed-loop learning telemetry with attribution keys
title: Ingest + persist closed-loop learning telemetry with attribution keys

sections.text: Implement a backend ingestion endpoint and durable storage for closed-loop learning outcome events using the canonical schema from GOLD-106. Ensure each event is validated and persisted with joinable keys (recommendation_instance_id, account/opportunity + CRM IDs, segment/rep/motion) so downstream attribution and aggregation are reliable. Add minimal observability (invalid-event counters, ingest latency, and drop/error logs) without blocking core recommendation workflows.
